home.title: Game list
home.subtitle: Play Unity games in your web browser

game.title: Unity Game
game.error: An error occurred while loading the game.
game.scriptLoadError: Unable to load Unity loader script.
game.scriptLoadErrorCauses:
Possible causes:
1. Incorrect file path
2. CORS policy issue
3. File does not exist

Check the Network tab in your browser's developer tools to see the file request status.
game.fileCheck: Please check that game files are correctly placed in the public/game/GODUCK folder.
game.requiredFiles: Required files: Build/GODUCK.loader.js, Build/GODUCK.framework.js.unityweb, Build/GODUCK.wasm.unityweb, Build/GODUCK.data.unityweb
game.consoleCheck: Check the browser console for details.
game.loaderNotFound: createUnityInstance function not found. Unity loader script may not have loaded correctly.
game.canvasNotConnected: Canvas element is not connected to the DOM.
game.domError: DOM manipulation error: Unity loader could not find DOM element. This may be a conflict between React's virtual DOM and Unity loader. Original error: {error}
game.rotateToLandscape: Please rotate your device to landscape mode
game.rotateToLandscapeIOS: Please rotate your device to landscape
